layman_description: How many inventory slots this container has for storing items inside.
technical_description: Inventory slot count for container entity definition.
player_impact: Larger containers let you store more loot.

layman_description: How long you must wait between taking items from this container.
technical_description: Reuse cooldown duration between item withdrawal actions.
player_impact: Prevents spamming item pickups from containers.

layman_description: Sound effect that plays when you open this container.
technical_description: Audio event trigger on container state change to open.
player_impact: Gives audio feedback when opening chests and safes.

layman_description: Sound effect when you close this container after looting it.
technical_description: Audio event trigger on container state change to closed.
player_impact: Signals when container access is complete.

layman_description: Sound effect when you try to open a locked container.
technical_description: Audio event for lock state access denial.
player_impact: Tells you when a container is locked without opening it.

layman_description: What item you need to unlock this container (like lockpicks).
technical_description: Required item entity reference for container unlocking.
player_impact: Determines what tools you need to break into locked containers.

layman_description: How long it takes to lock pick this container open.
technical_description: Duration for lock picking action completion.
player_impact: Some locks open faster than others.

layman_description: Chance that your lockpick breaks while trying to unlock this container.
technical_description: Probability value for lock pick destruction on failure.
player_impact: High-quality picks break less often.

layman_description: Sound effect when you upgrade or repair this block.
technical_description: Audio event for block upgrade action completion.
player_impact: Confirms when you've successfully upgraded a block.

layman_description: Number of hits needed to upgrade this block to the next tier.
technical_description: Impact count threshold for block upgrade trigger.
player_impact: Some blocks upgrade faster with fewer hits.

layman_description: Whether this block automatically aligns to terrain height when placed.
technical_description: Boolean flag for terrain height-matching placement.
player_impact: Some blocks stick to terrain, others float above it.

layman_description: Whether this item places as a block or stays as an inventory item.
technical_description: Placement mode enum for item-to-block conversion.
player_impact: Determines if you can place this item in the world.

layman_description: Special placement behavior like facing walls or door orientation.
technical_description: Placement enum defining directional or attachment requirements.
player_impact: Some blocks have specific placement requirements.

layman_description: Which direction this block's handle or access point faces.
technical_description: Face direction enum for handle/attachment point.
player_impact: Affects where you interact with this block.

layman_description: How far away you can stand and still place this block.
technical_description: Maximum placement distance for block interaction.
player_impact: Some blocks have limited placement range.

layman_description: Minimum distance you must be away from this block to place it.
technical_description: Minimum placement distance for block interaction.
player_impact: Prevents placing blocks on top of yourself.

layman_description: Percentage chance this block drops loot when destroyed.
technical_description: Probability value for loot generation on destruction.
player_impact: Some blocks always have loot, others sometimes don't.

layman_description: Area around this decorative block that counts as being 'decorated'.
technical_description: Radius distance for aesthetic effect application.
player_impact: Affects how far decorations provide ambiance benefits.

layman_description: How much this block shows up on heat vision maps.
technical_description: Thermal signature strength for heat map rendering.
player_impact: Determines visibility under thermal vision.

layman_description: How long this block stays hot and visible on heat maps after being damaged.
technical_description: Duration for thermal signature persistence.
player_impact: Recently damaged blocks glow hotter on heat vision.
